title: Customized Online Learning Environment Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and LMS (Learning Management System) usage experience
context.additional_context: Designs a flexible learning environment for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to acquire foundational knowledge in social domains.

learning_goals: Within three weeks, learners can freely combine LMS tools (discussion boards, repositories, calendars, etc.) to construct personalized learning environments aligned with their learning styles and job roles
By week 4, learners can improve the learning environment through peer interaction and submit a 1,000-character improvement report reflecting these changes
In the final project, learners can design one work-applicable learning module and validate it through peer review and instructor feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
